title: HOMIES FROM ALL AROUND HELP ME WITH MY PROBLEM, MY BROTHERS AND SISTERS WHO EVER IT BE .... HELP
body:
I have  been trying to install league for the past 2 weeks you see me but the patcher keep gettin stuck at like any percent like no BS ANY PERCENT YOU GET ME so like plz if any of yall got like anything that can help me out shout me out alright peace yall

PS ive tried the connection and permission support thing form league so yea none of that works

replies.body:
Hey flarejm! 

Can you try the steps listed in the following thread and let me know if anything works for you? Thanks!

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/qGY56UB4-comprehensive-troubleshooting-your-patching-issues

> [{quoted}](name=Wuks,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=20KNtBoE,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-05-11T02:40:21.243+0000)
>
> Hey flarejm! 
> 
> Can you try the steps listed in the following thread and let me know if anything works for you? Thanks!
> 
> http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/qGY56UB4-comprehensive-troubleshooting-your-patching-issues

thank you so much the switching to na to eu solved it really appreciate it

> [{quoted}](name=flarejm,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=20KNtBoE,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2016-05-14T17:35:31.616+0000)
>
> thank you so much the switching to na to eu solved it really appreciate it

Great to hear! Cheers!

I should be able to help out, but first, when you get stuck at a certain percentage, what happens?  Do you get an error message?  What does the patcher say when it gets "stuck"?

Reply back and let me know!

> [{quoted}](name=dArtagnan,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=20KNtBoE,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-05-10T23:30:47.832+0000)
>
> I should be able to help out, but first, when you get stuck at a certain percentage, what happens?  Do you get an error message?  What does the patcher say when it gets "stuck"?
> 
> Reply back and let me know!
it usually says lol patcher  has stopped working or a bug splat

Hmmm...if the steps from Wuks doesn't seem to help out, make sure to try all of the steps in our [BugSplat Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974).  There are a fair amount of steps there, but they should get this error to stop appearing and get you back in.

Give me a heads up if nothing seems to work!

> [{quoted}](name=dArtagnan,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=20KNtBoE,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2016-05-11T21:06:26.994+0000)
>
> Hmmm...if the steps from Wuks doesn't seem to help out, make sure to try all of the steps in our [BugSplat Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974).  There are a fair amount of steps there, but they should get this error to stop appearing and get you back in.
> 
> Give me a heads up if nothing seems to work!

hey the switching from na to eu worked thanks for the info appreciate it

> [{quoted}](name=dArtagnan,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=20KNtBoE,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2016-05-11T21:06:26.994+0000)
>
> Hmmm...if the steps from Wuks doesn't seem to help out, make sure to try all of the steps in our [BugSplat Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974).  There are a fair amount of steps there, but they should get this error to stop appearing and get you back in.
> 
> Give me a heads up if nothing seems to work!

ok thanks
bug splat or lol pathcer has stopped working
